Package org.gearvrf.scene_objects

Specialized scene objects

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GVRVideoSceneObjectPlayer<T>
    Use to supply different media player objects to GVRVideoSceneObject.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GVRCameraSceneObject
    A scene object that shows live video from one of the device's cameras
    GVRConeSceneObject  
    GVRCubeSceneObject  
    GVRCylinderSceneObject  
    GVRCylinderSceneObject.CylinderParams  
    GVRGearControllerSceneObject
    A GVRSceneObject meant to better respresent a GearVR controller.
    GVRGUISceneObject
    This class extends the GVRViewSceneObject to make interaction with Android Views simple.
    GVRKeyboardSceneObject
    * A scene object that renders a virtual Keyboard.
    GVRKeyboardSceneObject.Builder
    Builder for the GVRKeyboardSceneObject.
    GVRLineSceneObject
    A GVRSceneObject representing a line or ray
    GVRModelSceneObject
    Scene object that holds a loaded model.
    GVRSphereSceneObject  
    GVRTextViewSceneObject  
    GVRVideoSceneObject
    A scene object that shows video, using the Android MediaPlayer.
    GVRViewSceneObject
    This class represents a Scene object that shows a View into the scene with an arbitrarily complex geometry.
    GVRWebViewSceneObject Deprecated
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GVRTextViewSceneObject.fontStyleTypes  
    GVRTextViewSceneObject.IntervalFrequency
    The refresh frequency of this sceneobject.
    GVRTextViewSceneObject.justifyTypes
    Enumerated types for justification and style
